question: You are studying for a qualification, and you would like some time off work to complete it.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:Ask for some time off to complete a qualification.Suggest what you will do later at work if you have time off.Say how the qualification helps your job or company.You do NOT need to write any addresses.You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing to let you know that I want to take a seven-day leave this month in order to complete my studies. I will do all the accumulated work right after my return in coordination with my colleagues. Knowing that the achieved degree will help me with my job at your company.

The university decided to compress all the finals into one period which is the last month of this year. Meanwhile, I have to prepare myself well to get a high score on my tests. Thus, I wonder if you can give me an off-period to get myself ready.

Concerning the tasks in my vacation time, I promise you to complete all of them and assure you that everything is going in the right direction. Moreover, I have told my colleague Jack to take my responsibilities on his shoulders as much as he can. Learning to account and getting a certificate in this field will definitely improve my skills and knowledge and that can reflect positively on my work.
I hope you can accept my one-week leave request.
